name: Only Shapes No Beats
description:
Controls: 

W A S D - Movement

Right-click - Basic Attack

Left-click - Dash Attack

Elijah Simmons - Game Programmer

Adam Zuber - Game Designer

Made in ~2 weeks for the SGDA 2022 Spring Game Jam

This is the Jam version, not everything we wanted to do was implemented, so there may be a more developed future release.
